title: GOP Pushes Voter Restrictions | Hugh Evans
itunes:title: GOP Pushes Voter Restrictions | Hugh Evans
description:
Republican lawmakers in several states go on an anti-voting blitz, Roy Wood Jr. celebrates the contributions of Black journalists, and humanitarian Hugh Evans discusses Global Citizen.


To help fight food insecurity in Texas resulting from recent snowstorms, go to dailyshow.com/HoustonFoodBank.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
